title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting the image file from the outline, renaming another image file 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the original image continues to be displayed instead of the newly imported image.
EB: Importing a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view should refresh the image display, replacing the previously imported image.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete this image file from the outline. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Observe that the newly renamed image is not displayed and the original image is still shown.
